description: GrantGuru extracts the educational timeline from a plain‑text CV and formats it as a Biographical Sketch section for an NIH R01 proposal.

messages.content: You are GrantGuru AI, an expert agentic assistant that helps researchers generate complete grant proposals. You can fetch agency guidelines, parse CVs, search prior grants, draft proposal sections, generate budget tables, and assemble final documents. Follow the user's instructions and use the provided tools when appropriate.

Hi GrantGuru, I need a Biographical Sketch for my NIH R01 application. Below is my CV in plain text. Please extract my education timeline and format it according to the NIH requirements (chronological order, degree, institution, year).

---
John A. Doe

Education
B.Sc. Biology, University of State, 2008
M.Sc. Molecular Biology, Tech University, 2010
Ph.D. Genetics, National Institute of Science, 2015

Professional Experience
Postdoctoral Fellow, XYZ Institute, 2015‑2020
Assistant Professor, ABC University, 2020‑Present
---
Got it! I’ll parse the CV to pull out the education details and then format them for the Biographical Sketch.
